entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New test xunit wrapper generator should produce errors when test method isn't public #74846
  • Mono Framework package is from an unidentified developer #74844
  • [CoreCLR Infrastructure] Improve diagnosability of Crossgen2 comparison job failures #74843
    8.0.0
  • Four crossgen-comparison jobs are failing regularly in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 outerloop runs #74842
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializableAttribute does not work with source generated properties #74841
  • `XmlWriterSettings.NewLineOnAttributes` is ignored on writing `xmlns:*` attributes #74840
  • Failures in SSL Stream tests: There are no more endpoints available in the endpoint mapper. #74838
  • Thread Count dropping by 90% in .NET Core 3.1 Linux #74827
  • runtime - Source-build behavior control update #74819
  • [wasm] implement browser cache busting #74815
    8.0.0
  • Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F.VL #74813
    8.0.0
  • assert in ProcessWaitState on Linux arm64 #74795
    Future
  • wrong cookie parse #74794
  • Unexpected System.BadImageFormatException for an invocation of a static abstract method declared in a non-generic interface #74792

Closed

  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Security #72401
    7.0.0
  • How to install an ASP Core .NET 6 as windows service? #74759
  • Regression in the XmlBaseWriter.cs #74752
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Runtime.Versioning #74733
    7.0.0
  • Typo in ClrEtwAll.man #74832
  • Incorrect behaviour of regex atomic groups #74722
  • Regex auto-atomicity too aggressive about \w and \b #74686
  • JsonConverter<IPAddress> fails to work #72393
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: List<T>[Range] #74824
  • Recommended Linux LLDB version #74790
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `test-main.js` needs an unhandled exception handler #73330
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Lock up at process shutdown on Windows when process has many threads #74678
    7.0.0
  • Helix test results are not getting uploaded for a lot of jobs #74699
  • [API Proposal]: Add `Ping.SendPingAsync` overloads with `CancellationToken` #67260
    Future
  • Distributed transactions: TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction doesn't work #74745
    7.0.0
  • Undo revert of Arcade update to ingest Workload Manifest task #71150
    6.0.8
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/simple/ParallelCrash/ParallelCrash.sh #72755
    Future
  • DataContractSerializer is not trimming safe #45559
    Future
  • [wasm] Enable crypto and related tests #37669
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: FormattableStringBuilder #74653
  • [QUIC] Long running test: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamConformanceTests.Parallel_ReadWriteMultipleStreamsConcurrently #73377
    7.0.0
  • HttpListener Stack over flow #73674
    8.0.0
  • IDBFS is Not defined #74664
    8.0.0
  • incorrect computation of build parallelism #74691
  • Remove `% 0` workaround in `Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices` #65230
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Fix conservative stack reporting #74849
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix buffer overruns in GC code #74847
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Throw ArgumentException on unsupported tar entry type #74845
    area-System.IO
  • Add CentOS Stream 9 to the helix matrix #74839
    community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing ci improvements #74837
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Ignoring all protocol extension messages that are not supported on .net6 #74836
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74834
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update LifetimeTrackingHttpMessageHandler.cs #74833
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add host trace message to indicate runtimeconfig was not found #74829
    area-Host
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable #74828
    area-System.Transactions
  • [wasm] trim System.Private.Uri.dll #74826
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Run code quality analyzers in the coreclr/tools directory #74825
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0] Issue was that if a BGC thread handles a mark stack overflow, #74814
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix issue #74741 - assert failure during weak pointer scanning. #74810
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [iOS] Test against iOS 16 beta #74809
    NO-MERGE
  • Fix `fgNoStructParamPromotion` #74807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add more optimizations for (https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/61412) #74806
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #74792 (Roslyn issue 63617) #74804
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Clean up remnants of Crossgen1 from test scripts and pipelines #74803
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] shorten JSInterop bench detection phase #74802
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable nullability warnings in JSON source generator #74801
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [ppc64le] Bug fixes #74800
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • appstart benchmark improvements #74799
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Extensions.Logging.Console: Only check for Android/Apple mobile on netcoreapp configs #74798
    os-android, area-Extensions-Logging, os-maccatalyst
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74796
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add a few more riscv64 stubs in PAL #74793
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid gate/worker thread creation failure stall the thread pool #74791
    area-System.Threading
  • Add WaitAsync functionality to Background Service #74789
    area-Extensions-Hosting

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #74692
  • JIT: extend copy prop to local fields #74384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use current version of clang and llvm in Linux prereqs #74811
    area-Meta
  • [wasm][debugger] Make possible to run debugger tests using runtime in debug mode #74830
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Unpin System.ValueTuple assembly version #74817
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/7.0] Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74823
    area-System.Xml, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74821
    area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] enable background GC on Unix #74772
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix two auto-atomicity Regex bugs #74726
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix Linux armv6 build on runtime-community.yml #74757
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect "illegal XML comment chars" check & add regression tests #74787
    area-System.Xml
  • Fix to skip adding self as next unrelated code list #74208
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES file #74760
    area-Setup, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix chinese character in project name #74816
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][test] install handlers for unhandled exceptions on browser #74751
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Discourage using explicit package references to ILCompiler to publish… #74769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • CI: Fix helix test results reporting #74788
    blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction() #74776
    area-System.Transactions
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Move distributed transaction test to OleTxTests #74748
    area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Log exit codes in browser samples to prevent tests from timeouting #74637
  • [ARM64] - JitDisasm - Make zero values and commas consistent #74717
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Move more legs out of runtime-staging #74783
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Skip System.Net.Requests tests on mono linux-arm64 #74668
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix possible stack overflow in HttpListener #74644
    area-System.Net.Http
  • add a null pointer guard around a usage of comp->vnStore #73958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use nproc without --all on Linux #74696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Refactor marshalling info parser to split overall logic from ordering #72687
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0

Updated

  • CI: Reduce the unrelated jobs running on wasm only PRs #74601
    area-Infrastructure
  • Sort out side of GetChildKeys #74736
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add missing System.Formats.Tar docs #74786
    area-System.IO
  • Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion #74157
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Make Type.GetTypeCode/IsEnum intrinsics #71685
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Support building a mono-based .NET Runtime on x64 #68424
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Determine any memory/CPU limitations from sysfs cgroup #74237
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Android][libs] Introduce GetLocalUtcOffset temporary fast result #74459
    area-System.Runtime, os-android
  • [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74638
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] SIMD support improvements #73289
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Add non-generic Create method to DispatchProxy #73046
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution, Future
  • [wasm] JS interop without JS code gen - CSP friendly #74441
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] box+callvirt optimization #73456
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Reuse shared invoker and throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add Fedora 38 RID #74372
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix some incorrect SpecialFolder entries for Unix #68610
    area-System.Runtime, breaking-change, os-linux, os-mac-os-x, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Delete a bit more `OBJ(ADDR(...))` wrapping from `impNormStructVal` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Skip unnecessary binary VN folding checks #73919
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: packages not building or publishing #1970

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimisation on compiling problem #1859

PullRequests

Merged

  • Make sure we don't select the first cold runtime function into the last hot method #1974
  • Update the test infra scripts #1973

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source-build behavior control update #27562

Closed

  • NETSDK1152 "multiple publis h output files with the same relative path" with completely different paths coming from NuGet package #27536

PullRequests

Created

  • Update AOT test (#27334) #27574
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge 7.0.1xx rc1 to rc2 #27568
  • Use architecture specific DOTNET_ROOT veriable name #27566
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Eliminate duplicate inputs to ComputeBlazorBuildAssets #27561
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27556
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Add Dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27555
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • Pass in reference assemblies to ApiCompat #27554
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Update AOT test #27334
    Area-ILLink
  • Add test for framework trimming warnings #27461
    Area-ILLink
  • Added `new` to the list of commands to track the second verb #27457
    area: dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27479
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Moved the options to new \ new create level #27455
    area: dotnet new
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1976836 #27439
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Get PublishRelease and PackRelease working in .*proj, Solutions #26808
    Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.1xx
  • Hot reload script injection improvements #27537
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Removing default ProduceReferenceAssembly value for F# #26306
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RemoteSymbolFinderService gold bars with missing required document #63682
    17.4
  • New Inline Rename Checkboxes close session when clicked #63676
  • Source-build behavior control update #63667
    Backlog
  • Show embedded language classification in syntax visualizer #63664
    Backlog

Closed

  • WorkspacesNetCore.MetadataReference should not need to wait for all asynchronous operations #34264
  • Test plan for "Attributes on Main for top level programs" #57047
    17.4
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32830.180 #63678
  • Incorrect CS8166 when calling [UnscopedRef] method to assing to a scoped local #63524
    17.4
  • Raw string literal with `u8` suffix, either and/or editor and compiler parsing issue #63669
  • 'Introduce local' CodeAction in 'async Task' ArrowExpression adds invalid 'return' keyword to new method body #61796
    Backlog
  • BadImageFormatException for abstract static from non-generic interface #63617
    17.4
  • Consider consolidating CA1801 and IDE0060 #63641
    17.4
  • Unclear stack state for unconditional branches #63564
  • Build fails for transitive nuget references, introduced in 17.3 #63596
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32829.245 #63659

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we look for source-generated documents when making an OOP call #63683
    Area-IDE
  • Re-introduce main-vs-deps #63680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • break integration tests into three phases to better measure them #63677
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Method group defaults #63673
    Area-Compilers
  • Add feature to recommend making a struct 'readonly' when all its fields are already readonly. #63668
    Area-IDE
  • Fix race condition in analyzer driver for computing nodes to analyze … #63665
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • fix incorrect variable name #63663
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make IPreviewService async, or synchronous with threading requirements #63661
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Fix potential deadlock if we are previewing a rename change #63652
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • Convert workspaces and new document formatting integration tests to new framework #63610
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip compiler-only changes for corehost pipeline #63684
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63670
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Restore focus to the textview after rename #63660
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge
  • How to debug bootstrap failure locally #63681
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63679
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update CodeAnalysis.Testing dependency #63416
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Run 'make struct readonly' on IDE code #63674
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run 'make struct readonly' on compiler code #63675
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Enable nullable in C# keyword recommenders and their tests #63639
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Install 3.1 runtime during official builds #63672
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63671
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Do not return awaited void task in "Introduce local" refactoring #63385
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #63632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Semantic Snippets - Class Snippet #63402
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove the single-symbol assumption in ConflictResolver Session #63150
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63649
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Delete publishing steps that are no longer needed #63651
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Provide way to dynamically create builtin-operator symbols off of a compilation #63408
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63687
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63686
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support RefSafetyRulesAttribute for interop with existing assemblies #63461
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Account for using declarations in nested switch statement gotos #63655
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't include syntax tree's contents when throwing NFWs #63653
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 17 3 packages #63599
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Produce warning on duplicate analyzer references #63264
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types EE support #62812
    Area-Compilers
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Editorconfig diagnostics #63580
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Refactoring constructor initializers to use primary constructors #63648
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Report an error for an unsupported type tests involving 'ref' structs. #63646
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for metadata-only endpoints to support path-based authorization, output caching, etc. #43642
    .NET 8 Planning
  • dotnet watch tests fail when run locally #43640
  • Source-build behavior control update #43637
  • Log instead of just crashing when `PostLogoutRedirectUris` in client definition is empty #43634
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: single_query #43633
  • Add equivalent of HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId available at all times when hosted in IIS #43632

Closed

  • SignalR doesn't always reliable detect TCP/IP issues #43392
    7.0-rc2
  • React template should use UTF-8 #43636
  • Add equivalent of HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppId available at all times when hosted in IIS #43631
  • Using different Authentication Scheme for JWT tokens does not work #43467
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/7.0] Set `MSBUILDLOGALLENVIRONMENTVARIABLES` in most CI jobs #43644
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Require preview features for most quic options #43639
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • [release/7.0] QUIC: Don't complete writes on abort #43630
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43638
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • Pin language version in release branch #43629
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43596
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Improve port search retry logic #43557
    area-runtime
  • Use normal `$(_BuildArgs)` in internal jobs w/ binlogs #43597
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix endpoints in StaticFileAuth sample #43352
    area-security, 8.0-alpha1
  • [Backport] [SignalR] Fix WebSocket client close when network disappears #43576
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.10
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1976557 #43599
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Add and use RDF.InferMetadata and update new PopulateMetadata API #43543
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • Improve vary-by rules #43257
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0-rc2
  • Update UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md #43627
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Source-build behavior control update #3331

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main into release/stable #3332

Merged

  • Bump Azure.Storage.Blobs from 12.9.1 to 12.13.0 in /eng/release/DiagnosticsReleaseTool #3217
    dependencies

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editor/Entry controls don't raise Completed event consistently cross-plat #9796
  • OnSizeAllocated not being hit for iOS MAUI apps on screen rotation #9795
  • Add better support for Android 12+ Splash Screen APIs #9794
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Have better BlazorWebView diagnostics and logging #9792
  • iOS CollectionView cell-reuse issues with Converters #9791
  • Mac Catalyst Picker is almost impossible to press #9786
  • Context Menus on catalyst currently only open if you secondary click an actual HTML Element #9784
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Investigate and fix XFC0000 errors for external assemblies #9781
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Was the issue with MAUI project templates appearing for VS Preview resolved? #9777
  • CarouselView crashes IOS app #9775
  • Set or Get Row & Column Properties. #9774
  • Image caching should be configurable for all ImageSources #9773
    Backlog
  • Inconsitent LinearGradientBrush between Android and iOS #9772
  • Cannot change configuration name in MAUI app #9771
  • .NET Maui Intellisense is super slow, Both C# in .CS and Blazor.razor .C#, 3 to 4 seconds hangs every type. #9770
  • MAUI Android projects generate an \obj\Debug\net6.0-android\Resource.designer.cs file containing code that assigns values to const identifiers #9766
  • Shell content navigation does not navigate to correct view #9765

Closed

  • [Android] (Android 12 only) When app is started from device, icon is used as splashscreen #7303
  • CarouselView displaying views through DataTemplate throws exception when loop is enabled #9744
  • [Android] MauiSplashScreen BaseSize doesn't work #7304
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Android] API 31 (Android 12) svg on splashscreen is not showing #7289
  • SVG Icon and Splash Problems #9322
    7.0-rc2
  • Release build of sample app fails when startup page replaced with simple NavigationPage (Android) #7214
  • Android app crashes after splash screen - [OpenGLRenderer] unknown bitmap configuration #7737
    Backlog
  • Title Bar Main 3 buttons don't work as expected #9737
  • Weird bugs concerning static resources and value converters #9709
  • MenuBar/MenubarItem does not bind to commands #9762
  • Shadow markup extension error #4974
    Backlog
  • Review the number of fragments created to renderer a Shell App #9042
    .NET 7 Planning
  • DatePicker: Format not working on Windows. VS 2022 - Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7972
    6.0-servicing
  • [iOS] Slider's MaximumValue does not change after initial assignment #5160
    6.0-servicing
  • <CollectionView.EmptyView> is only shown once #7076
    6.0-servicing
  • When the title set to string empty place for title is still exist #7198
    6.0-servicing
  • Cannot display alert from modal page on iOS #7444
    6.0-servicing
  • Frame Background with Bound Colors causes null exception and invalid frame handler trace #7449
    6.0-servicing
  • ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" does not work in Android #7963
    6.0-servicing
  • Readonly Editor cannot show multiple lines on Android #7989
    6.0-servicing
  • Shadow crashes the app when used on root element of a ViewCell #8252
    6.0-servicing
  • Entry as plain text if IsPassword="True" and IsReadOnly="True" #8267
    6.0-servicing
  • `RadialGradientBrush` with `Center` rendering is broken on Windows #8361
    6.0-servicing
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerExceptionon picker if property bound to ItemDisplayBinding is null #8377
    6.0-servicing
  • Setting Border.StrokeShape ignores initial StrokeThickness value #8481
    6.0-servicing
  • Preferences.Get() returns default type value instead of defaultValue parameter value #9748
  • MAUI iOS is not working properly after it is delivered to Appstore, or TestFlight #9597
  • Consuming Component that uses Nuget package in Razor class Library #9706

PullRequests

Created

  • GitHub Workflows security hardening #9790
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [Maps] Fix map userlocation #9789
  • Add Grey color overloads #9788
    6.0-sr5
  • [.NET 6] Backport WinForms & WPF CSS Hot Reload Fixes #9787
    area/blazor 🕸️, feature-blazor-windesktop, 7.0-rc2, 7.0-rc2
  • [Android] Fix crash using Page IsBusy property #9783
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖
  • Fix TypeConverts API Docs #9780
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.3.0 to 17.3.1 #9779
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22426.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22429.1 #9778
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Tizen] Update handling IconPressed event of MauiToolbar #9769
    community ✨, platform/tizen
  • [Tizen] Update SkiaGraphicsView.Tizen.cs #9767
    community ✨, platform/tizen

Merged

  • Use correct type for template selector on Shell #9782
    area/shell 🐢, 7.0-rc2
  • Update SkiaSharp to the new stable #9509
    area/single project ☝️, 6.0-sr5
  • [Maps] Fix initial property set when Map is not ready yet #9776
    platform/android 🤖, 7.0-rc1
  • Revert "Fix Shadow rendering on iOS Border (#8464)" #9760
    area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Build the net6 templates in net7 #9758

  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605

  • [Windows] Updated used ListViewItem style (avoid CornerRadius etc) #8584

  • Copy MAUI to bin when SelfContained=False #8285

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Translate DateTimeOffset.ToUnixTime[Seconds|Milliseconds] #28925
  • Include types in exception message for EF.Default failure #28922
  • EF.Default doesn't work for value types #28921

Closed

  • FK for generated key using TPC sometimes gets temporary value persisted to database on SaveChanges #28654
    7.0.0
  • Sqlite: DateOnly/TimeOnly arithmetic should throw exception #28051
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Can't load extensions that modify existing functions or collations #26220
    7.0.0-rc2
  • Consider migrating all of the msbuild files from the current nuget packages to an msbuild sdk. #28882
  • ## Owned Entity Collection Property Migration Error #28869
  • Migration Problem With ColumnType Set In Owned Entity #28868
  • Foreign key from root parent not set in child entity nested at third level. #28814
  • Received Error The entity type '***' requires a primary key to be defined. If you intended to use a keyless entity type, call 'HasNoKey' in 'OnModelCreating' On Inside Entity Coulmn #28744
  • Get TPH Queryable from TPT "ish" implementation with the currently supported feature set? #28919
  • Multiple Contexts and Transactions #28880
  • A method to configure all dbcontexts in the same service collection at one place. #28772
  • Reduce repeating parameters #28768

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop setting JSON array entities' state to Modified in SaveChanges #28926
  • Make filtered unique index update dependencies soft #28923

Merged

  • Use unmapped FKs for topological order when propagating store-generated values #28851
  • Add daily build info for tools and templates #28920
  • SQLite Query: Fix more DateOnly/TimeOnly cases #28918
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use sqlite3_load_extension #28903

Updated

  • Perform structural equality in ExpressionEqualityComparer #28720
